venue.name: The Summit View Banquet & Meeting House

item.description:
Friday nights at the Summit-View

This event was suggested on the Message Board....
Sounds fun. It's tomorrow night

Friday, July 6th Union Jack

The Summitview Banquet and Meeting House is proud to bring you
the best in local entertainment. In addition to live music there will be
a BBQ Buffet, Cash Bar, and no cover charge* for the music.

Free to the public!
Food available from 5:30 pm - 8:00 pm
Music starts around 6:30 pm
Music rain or shine!

lots of dancing.......

NOTE: These run each Friday evening all summer long, so I'll be planning more.

DIRECTIONS
Conveniently located on Route 5 in the Smith's Ferry section of Holyoke, Massachusetts, Hamel's Creative Catering and Summit View Banquet House is equally distant (4 miles) from exits 17A and 18 off Interstate 91. Located just 5 miles from downtown Northampton and 15 miles from downtown Springfield, Hamel's Creative Catering and Summit View Banquet House is easy to get to and from.

From the North:

Take Exit 18 on I-91 and proceed to end of the ramp. At the end of the ramp take a right onto Rt. 5 South. Follow for approximately five miles and Hamel's Creative Catering and Summit View Banquet House will be on your right.

From the South:

Follow I-91 North to Exit 17A. Follow ramp to merge onto Rt. 141 South. Get into the left lane and take a left turn at the stop light onto Rt. 5 North heading towards Northampton. Follow Rt. 5 North for approximately 5 miles and Hamel's Creative Catering and Summit View Banquet House will be on your left.

From the Massachusetts Turnpike:

Take Exit 4 (West Springfield) and follow signs for I-91 North.Take I-91 North to Exit 17A. Follow ramp to merge onto Rt. 141 South. Get into the left lane and take a left turn at the stop light onto Rt. 5 North heading towards Northampton. Follow Rt. 5 North for approximately 5 miles and Hamel's Creative Catering and Summit View Banquet House will be on your left.


Here is their website, if you want more information:

http://www.summitview...
